Stressed About Inherited Property? Here’s a Way Out Without the Headache

1. Problem Hook (60 words)

Key Message: Appeal to those feeling overwhelmed by inherited property issues

  • Start with a direct question: “In a bind with family property and feeling stuck?”
  • Describe the chaos: untrustworthy family, running power off generators, behind on taxes
  • Acknowledge shared stress: “You’re not alone in this”
  • Emotional Tone: Understanding, identifying

2. Credibility Marker (20 words)

Key Message: Establish Kris as a capable and knowledgeable ally

  • Mention: “I’m Kris, and we’ve successfully helped over 350 families solve their property challenges.”
  • Emotional Tone: Confident, reassuring

3. Agitation (75 words)

Key Message: Highlight the stress and complexity of the situation

  • Touch on personal experience: understanding chaos, from probate to tax issues
  • Empathize: “It’s hard when trust issues mix with financial stress and family dynamics”
  • Create a relatability touchpoint: "Feels like an emotional rollercoaster, doesn’t it?"
  • Emotional Tone: Empathic, sincere

4. Credibility Story (70 words)

Key Message: Demonstrate problem-solving and effective resolution

  • Share a past case: sold an out-of-state property for a client with behind taxes and family issues
  • Detail action: paying taxes just in time, resolving family conflicts
  • Outcome: client’s relief and regained family harmony
  • Conclusion: showing proof of serious problems being tackled and solved
  • Emotional Tone: Encouraging, positive

5. Transition (30 words)

Key Message: Transition from past successes to available help

  • Bridge: “If we could do it for them, imagine what we can do for you.”
  • Emotional Tone: Inspiring, motivating

6. Bridge Offers (60 words)

Key Message: Present tangible solutions with clarity

  • BRV Seller Special: Sell on your terms, no overwhelm
  • BRV Concierge Program: Maximize sale price—all work done by us at no upfront cost
  • Highlight options tailored to specific pain points
  • Emotional Tone: Empowering, hopeful

7. Call to Action (60 words)

Key Message: Extend a friendly invitation to connect

  • Encourage: “Click the link for a personalized Exit Strategy Report—no pressure, just insight”
  • Reassure: “We welcome questions or comments; you’ll get a personal response.”
  • End on supportive note: “We’re here to help you get back to enjoying life”
  • Emotional Tone: Warm, approachable
